title: What types of cards are supported by my phone's card slots?
answer:
l   Single SIM card phones

−       Card slot 1: supports nano-SIM cards

−       Card slot 2: only supports microSD cards, not nano-SIM cards.

l   Dual SIM card phones

−       Card slot 1: supports nano-SIM cards

−       Card slot 2: supports SD cards or nano-SIM cards.
